# <a name="delete-a-contact-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="09a3d-102">Brisanje kontakta u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09a3d-102">Delete a contact in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="09a3d-103">U donjem levom uglu stranice izaberite ikonu " **osobe** "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09a3d-103">At the bottom left corner of the page, select the **People** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="09a3d-104">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09a3d-104">.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="09a3d-105">Izaberite kontakt koji želite da izbrišete i izaberite stavku **Izbriši**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09a3d-105">Select the contact you want to delete and select **Delete**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09a3d-106">Ako ne možete da izaberete opciju " **Izbriši**", kontakt je možda iz Skype-a ili povezanog naloga društvenih mreža.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09a3d-106">If you can't select **Delete**, the contact might be from Skype or a connected social network account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09a3d-107">Da biste izbrisali kontakt, idite na Skype ili nalog u kome se nalazi kontakt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09a3d-107">To delete the contact, go to Skype or the account where the contact is located.</span></span>
